evidence.claim: The company adheres to HIPAA regulations, ensuring patient data security during telehealth and remote services.
Integrated Home Care Services utilizes FHIR for interoperability in electronic health records to facilitate patient data exchange.
The company has established protocols for X12 transaction sets for claims processing and billing in their health services.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of using X12 transactions or clearinghouse services found on the website.
